smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Object 'PreferencesAW' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Object 'AnalyticsUtils' with '44' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'DiscreteScrollLayoutManager' with '47' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'Helper' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'HorizontalHelper' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'VerticalHelper' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'FragmentCarouselWebcam' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'AbstractFragmentWebcam' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class AnalyticsUtils is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.
Class DiscreteScrollLayoutManager is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function weatherImage appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.
The function onBindViewHolder appears to be too complex.
The function calculateAllowedScrollIn appears to be too complex.
The function initWebCam appears to be too complex.
The function getUrlForWebcam appears to be too complex.
The function uploadFile appears to be too complex.
The function getSections appears to be too complex.
The function onCreate appears to be too complex.

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface Helper is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function doInBackground is nested too deeply.

smells.name: EmptyClassBlock
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: The class or object  ApplicationImpl is empty.
The class or object  GenericFileProvider is empty.
The class or object  ViewHolder is empty.
The class or object  ViewHolder is empty.
The class or object  MyAppGlideModule is empty.
The class or object  Weather is empty.
The class or object  Section is empty.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'GlideModule.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'MyAppGlideModule'.

smells.name: ClassNaming
smells.description: A classes name should fit the naming pattern defined in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Class and Object names should match the pattern: [A-Z$][a-zA-Z0-9$]*

smells.name: EqualsWithHashCodeExist
smells.description: Always override hashCode when you override equals. All hash-based collections depend on objects meeting the equals-contract. Two equal objects must produce the same hashcode. When inheriting equals or hashcode, override the inherited and call the super method for clarification.

instances.message: A class should always override hashCode when overriding equals and the other way around.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: HOUR_48_MILLISECONDS can be a `const val`.
EXTRA_POSITION can be a `const val`.
DEFAULT_TIME_FOR_ITEM_SETTLE can be a `const val`.
DEFAULT_FLING_THRESHOLD can be a `const val`.
mock can be a `const val`.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function getIfWeatherCouldBeDisplayed has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function weatherImage has 7 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function getItemViewType has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function scrollBy has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function checkNewOnFlingPositionIsInBounds has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function onOptionsItemSelected has 5 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function doInBackground has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: okhttp3.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.salomonbrys.kodein.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.salomonbrys.kodein.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.salomonbrys.kodein.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Private function startActivityDetailCamera is unused.
Private function startActivityListWebcam is unused.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (total * 100) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: total * 100

smells.name: ForbiddenVoid
smells.description: `Unit` should be used instead of `Void`.

instances.message: 'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.
'Void' should be replaced with 'Unit'.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.
